snippet.title: Aragami - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Aragami is a stealth game in which you play as an undead assassin with the power to control the shadows. http://aragami-game.com

Play as Aragami, an undead assassin with supernatural abilities who is summoned back from the grave by a mysterious spirit named Yamiko. Between him and the answers to his fate lies the Kaiho - The army of Light - who guard Yamiko inside their heavily fortified citadel of Kyûryu.

Manipulate the dark, become the perfect assassin, and reach Yamiko to discover the secrets hidden in your past. 

www.fb.com/aragami-game
www.twitter.com/LinceWorks
